title: Submit Q4 budget report to Finance
description: Prepare financial forecasts for the expansion project. Include cost projections for infrastructure and maintenance.

title: Schedule team performance reviews
description: Annual reviews with direct reports. Discuss career progression, achievements, and development opportunities.

title: Fix production video conferencing issues
description: System keeps dropping connections during meetings. Escalate to IT team for urgent resolution.

title: Order catering for team offsite
description: Contact catering service for strategy meeting. Need lunch for 12 people plus dietary restrictions.

title: Research competitor market analysis
description: Analyze competitor positioning and market share. Focus on their product capabilities and distribution strategy.

title: Weekly team standup meeting
description: Review project progress, discuss blockers, assign action items for current sprint.

title: Coffee chat with DevOps about cloud migration
description: Discuss approaches for containerization and multi-region architecture. Learn from their recent experience.

title: Organize Q1 team building workshop
description: Cross-functional session to improve collaboration and communication. Book venue and coordinate schedules.

title: Review and refactor legacy authentication code
description: Update outdated authentication flow to modern standards. Improve security and maintainability.

title: Read industry research paper on ML optimization
description: Deep dive into new techniques for model performance. Could apply to current projects.

title: Prepare slides for client presentation
description: Create compelling deck showcasing project results and ROI. Include executive summary and technical details.

title: Update company newsletter content
description: Write article about recent product launch and team achievements. Due for next month's edition.
